mapper.select: select count(*) from reply where boardnum=#{num}

select v.num, v.state, v.name, v.subject, v.content, v.file, v.date, v.readcount, count(reply.num) replycount from volunteer v left outer join reply on v.num = reply.boardnum group by v.num order by num desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: update volunteer set readcount = readcount+1 where num=#{num}
update volunteer set state=#{state}, subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, file=#{file} where num=#{num}
